content.rendered:
I contacted JCG after my husband, who managed and operated our funeral home, suffered a fatal heart attack.  I needed to sell the business ASAP and had no clue where to start.  I do not work in the funeral business and was in no way prepared to run or sell the business – I was terrified.  Johnson Consulting reassured me that with their help, the business would sell.  And they kept their word – it sold!  They were incredibly patient with me and thoroughly explained the process.  I worked mostly with Karen;  she was professional, highly competent and always kept me in the loop with updates.  She did a tremendous amount of work, stayed with me when I was anxious and stayed on me when I got lazy!   When things got heated,  Karen kept her cool.  I didn’t have to worry about anything slipping through the cracks, as she was on top of everything all of the time!

I highly recommend Johnson Consulting if you are thinking about selling (or buying) a funeral home.  The price I paid was more than fair and they went above and beyond for me.

With much gratitude,

Suzanne Miller
